entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
